uint8_t answerToTheUniverseAndEverything() {
    //! [response]
    return ANSWER;
    //! [response]
}
```

constexpr uint8_t ANSWER{42U};
```


Entire files can be embedded
<!-- [geoffrey] [testdata/content/goat.txt] -->
```
  -^-_-^-_-^-_-^-_-^-_-^-
 (                       )
(   all glory hypnotoad   )
 (                       )
  -_-^-_-^-_-^-_-^-_-^-_- _
                         (_)
                            o
                              /_/
                             (oo)-------/
                             (_)-(      )
                               v  ||--||
                                  ||  ||
```


A manually managed code block
```c++
auto foo = "bar";
```
